thread.title: Lakeith Stanfield And Xosha Roquemore Are Expecting A Child
thread.title_full: Lakeith Stanfield And Xosha Roquemore Are Expecting A Child

author: Veronica Wells
title: Lakeith Stanfield And Xosha Roquemore Are Expecting A Child
text:
Lakeith Stanfield, the quirky character on Donald Glover’s “Atlanta” and the memorable one in Jordan Peele’s “Get Out” is embarking on a new project, fatherhood. The 32-year-old actor’s girlfriend, fellow actor, Xosha Roquemore, 25, who stars in the “Mindy Project” took International Women’s Day as an opportunity to announce her pregnancy.
I am WOMBMAN. #internationalwomensday ❤ 
A post shared by @xoshroq on Mar 8, 2017 at 9:58pm PST 

That one time I met Paperboi and Darius in the A 
A post shared by @xoshroq on Oct 7, 2016 at 4:18pm PDT 

Congratulations to these two!
The post Lakeith Stanfield And Xosha Roquemore Are Expecting A Child appeared first on MadameNoire .
